Posts.Content: My wife has Stage 4 Breast cancer with mets to the liver and now brain.  She was diagnosed in Sept 2014.  She has has Chemo and now whole brain radiation.  Two months after the radiation she has started getting constant nausea and fever twice daily.  She has tried 6 different nausea pills.  She also takes tamoxifen and a anti seizure med.  She has been in the hospital with lots of tests run still can't figure it out.  She is scheduled to get a scope of her stomach done in a few days.  Please let me know if you experienced the same and have any ideas? Thanks, Greg
Posts.Title: Fever and Nausea?
